mapper.select: SELECT team.*, `match`.*, count(en_num) as entry_count FROM team join `match` on te_mt_num = mt_num left join entry on en_te_num = te_num where te_mt_num = #{mt_num} and te_type = 0 group by te_num
SELECT team.*, `match`.* FROM team join `match` on te_mt_num = mt_num join club_team on ct_te_num = te_num where te_mt_num = #{mt_num} and te_type != 0 and ct_cl_num = #{cl_num} group by te_num
mapper.insert: insert into team(te_mt_num, te_type) values(#{mt_num}, ( select count(*) from team as t where t.te_mt_num = #{mt_num} and t.te_type != 0) + 1)
mapper.select: select * from team left join club_team on ct_te_num = te_num where te_mt_num = #{mt_num} and te_type != 0 order by te_num desc limit 1

select team.*, club_team.*, cl_name, count(en_num) as club_entry_count from team left join entry on en_te_num = te_num join club_team on ct_te_num = te_num join club on ct_cl_num = cl_num where te_type != 0 and te_mt_num = #{mt_num} group by te_num
mapper.update: update team set te_type = te_type - 1 where te_num = #{te_num}
